type.description:
## Owner

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/owner)

Checks whether the actor entity is the owner of the tamable target entity.

Type ID: `origins:owner`

---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:owner"
}
```
